text: Muhanmado wa, hitori no shito ni suginai. Shito-tachi wa kare no mae ni itta. Moshi kare ga shinu ka, matawa korosa retara, anata gata wa kibisuwokaesu no ka. Dare ga kakato o kaesoutomo, sukoshi mo arra o son'u koto wa dekinai. Daga arra wa, kansha (shite kare ni tsukaeru)-sha ni mukuwa reru
